item.title: The banisters of the stairs a filthy, 15th August
item.description:
The banisters of the stairs are grimy and filthy - the hand rails could really do with a full clean!!

item.title: Windows need cleaning, 15th August
item.description:
The windows are in need of cleaning externally - this has not been done since I've lived here. Cleaning the inside only goes so far, and its dangerous to try and clean the external windows from inside.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lapse Wood Walk, Dulwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The traffic bollard is not secure, 15th August
item.description:
The bollard is laying down, whilst currently not on the road it could be driven into/moved/kicked and cause a hazard to drivers. Also dangerous for pedestrians.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Crossway, Poverest, London

item.title: Temporary barrier gates left by workers, 15th August
item.description:
Workers have left behind 12 x 6ft metal barriers which are blocking parking and access to Trelawney Community Hall. They have been here for three weeks since the work was finished.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Paragon Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bin chute blocked, 15th August
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Dulwich, London

item.title: Incomplete street marking, 15th August
item.description:
Unfinished on pavement parking bay causing parking over fire hydrant. No yellow lines have been painted to prevent on road parking. Makes turning for delivery and service vehicles very difficult and has resulted in broken kerbs. See also ref: 7179420 and 6288664 marked as closed but no action taken
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Eynswood Drive, London
